INNO, nke a na-akpọbu Galeria Inno, bụ ụlọ ahịa dị na Beljọm nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa iri na isii
Ọ bụ enyemaka nke German Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof.
E hiwere ya na 1897 na Brussels dị ka A l'Innovation
INNO bụ onye guzobere ma nọgide na-abụ onye otu International Association of Department Stores site na 1928 ruo 2001
Emile Bernheim abụwo onye isi oche nke Association ugboro anọ na 1931, 1935, 1950, 1960.
Kemgbe afọ 2001, ọ bụ otu Galeria Kaufhof nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke Hudson's Bay Company mechara nweta n'afọ 2015.
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, onye nwe INNO ugbu a, Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof, na-eme atụmatụ ịpụ ma ree alaka INNO nke Belgium dị ka akụkụ nke usoro mmefu ego nke ya.
INNO na-arụ ọrụ n'ozuzu ụlọ ahịa ngalaba 16 na Belgium dum, nke atọ n'ime ha dị na Brussels.
